nodes.title: Generate OpenAPI from ZenWave Domain Language
nodes.excerpt: Because writing YAML by hand is now fun... You can use `ZenWave Domain Language` models as IDL to generate OpenAPI v3 with ZenWave SDK.

nodes.title: JDL To AsyncAPI v2
nodes.excerpt: Because writing YAML by hand is now fun... You can generate AsyncAPI v2/v3 from  JHipster JDL models with ZenWave SDK.

nodes.title: JDL To OpenAPI
nodes.excerpt: Because writing YAML by hand is now fun... You can generate OpenAPI v3 from  JHipster JDL models with ZenWave SDK.

nodes.title: API-First with AsyncAPI
nodes.excerpt: If you are familiar with OpenAPI and OpenAPI Generator API-First process, doing API-First with AsyncAPI is similar.

nodes.title: ZenWave AsyncAPI Code Generator
nodes.excerpt: With ZenWave SDK plugins, you can generate strongly typed business interfaces, payload and header DTOs and several integration patterns like Transactional Outbox, DeadLetter Queue... from AsyncAPI definitions.
